definition: shallow container made of metal, express a totally negative opinion of
details:
noun
- shallow container made of metal
- cooking utensil consisting of a wide metal vessel
= synonyms: cooking pan
verb
- express a totally negative opinion of
= example: express a totally negative opinion of
= synonyms: trash
- wash dirt in a pan to separate out the precious minerals
= synonyms: pan out, pan off
- make a sweeping movement
= example: make a sweeping movement
